title: Shocking photo of woman bound in bathtub emerges as body of Jamie Haggard found by road crew collecting garbage
itunes:title: Shocking photo of woman bound in bathtub emerges as body of Jamie Haggard found by road crew collecting garbage
description:
After beautiful mom Jamie Haggard dies, police charge her own brother, David Haggard, with her murder. Police find a photo of Jamie tied up in a bathtub, taken before her brother allegedly cut her body up into pieces.

Joining Nancy Grace to discuss the case:

  • Ashley Willcott : Trial Attorney, Judge, and Anchor at Court TV
  • James Shelnutt - 27 years Atlanta Metro area Major Case Detective, Retired Swat Officer
  • Dr. Tim Gallagher: Medical Examiner for the State of Florida
  • Dr. DeBoer: Licensed NY and PA Psychologist, Corrections Psychology Intervention, & Founder of Visionistas By Design
  • Dave Mack: CrimeOnline Investigative Reporter 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
